"Zimbecks Chess Puzzles" is a result of years of work. It is like an art gallery of chess positions. David has created a totally new style of composing which satisfies the needs of problemists and players alike. David did the bulk of his work from the ages of 14-18 and was a surprise to the puzzle community due to his young age. The book also contains a few composed games, problems from some of David's favorite composers, and a couple of his games.
$19.95 + Shipping
"How to Play Chess Like an Animal"
is a great book for kids and adults alike. The book make you laugh and  it will also teach your kid a few basic tactics and strategies.
